rows.DEPENDENCY GRAPH — WHAT ENABLES WHAT: MAX PARALLEL at any given time:
Week 0-1: 2 workstreams (Nilo + Claude on M0, hiring admin)
Week 2-3: 5 workstreams (Nilo, admin, MC, Dan James, sourcing PMs)
Week 3-5: 8+ workstreams (above + Series Producer, Product Person, PM #1, entity formation)
Week 5-8: 12+ workstreams (above + multiple clusters producing in parallel + expert reviews)
Week 8-12: 15+ workstreams (above + fundraise + CoS pipeline + remaining clusters)
The system SCALES its parallelism. Week 0 is narrow (just Nilo).
By Week 8 there are 15+ concurrent workstreams.
That's the whole thesis: complexity at launch is the moat.
Competitors can't replicate 15 parallel workstreams with 10+ people coordinating.
